meanings.definition: To undergo a surgical procedure to sterilize a male by cutting or blocking the vas deferens.
meanings.sent1: The man decided to get vasectomized to prevent having more children.
meanings.sent2: After the procedure, he was vasectomized and could no longer father children.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that getting vasectomized was like hitting the 'pause' button on parenthood.
meanings.sent4: His decision to get vasectomized was a permanent solution to his fertility concerns.
meanings.sent5: The image of the vas deferens being vasectomized stuck in his mind as he prepared for the surgery.
